import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update Workspace"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/v1/workspaces/{workspace_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update a workspace's name and/or status.
- Set `name` to update the workspace name
- Set `status` to 'active' or 'inactive' to change the workspace status
- When setting status to 'inactive', all active connections in the workspace will be automatically disabled

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"workspace_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","title":"Workspace Id"}},{"name":"x-organization-id","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Select the working organization. Necessary since users can belong to multiple organizations.","title":"X-Organization-Id"},"description":"Select the working organization. Necessary since users can belong to multiple organizations."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"name":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Name","description":"New name for the workspace"},"status":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string","enum":["active","inactive"],"title":"WorkspaceStatus"},{"type":"null"}],"description":"Set status to active or inactive"}},"type":"object","title":"WorkspaceUpdateRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
